Desc.entry: A local drama company with over ten years experience of using drama as an educational and community development tool for people of all ages, working in school and community settings. Able to plan and deliver short- or long-term drama projects to suit each client, including raising awareness, issue-based projects or workshops designed to enhance self-esteem and confidence, team building, social and communication skills. Previous experience working with youth offenders, people with mental health issues, substance and alcohol misusers, refugees and asylum seekers, BME and EAL groups, as well as children, young people and adults with moderate, severe, profound or multiple learning difficulties or behavioural issues.
